products.longDescription: Y Eau de Parfum is a bold and woody men's fragrance. Y stands for freedom to dream, dare, and live to be accomplished. This scent is infused with a blast of freshness to give you the confidence to achieve your best.

products.fragranceDescription: This fragrance is a deep and rich woody scent with an aromatic freshness. Notes of apple and sage bring a fresh feeling, while the vetiver adds a warm and woody touch.
products.quickLookDescription: A bold and woody fragrance with notes of apple, sage, and vetiver.
